metadata.title: CVE-2015-6673 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Use-after-free vulnerability in Decoder.cpp in libpgf before 6.15.32.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-6673` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libpgf6 - 6.14.12-3.1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libpgf package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '6.14.12-3.1ubuntu0.1').
